summary: When a man becomes tyrannical towards his family, the women of the house decide to teach him a lesson in gratitude.
cast: Johannes Meyer|Astrid Holm|Karin Nellemose|Mathilde Nielsen|Petrine Sonne|Clara Schønfeld|Johannes Nielsen|Aage Hoffman|Viggo Lindstrøm|Vilhelm Petersen|Byril Harvig|Aage Schmidt|Frk. Voss-Christensen|Georg Busch|Frank Henriksen|Charles Hansen|Carl Hinz|Inga Bentsen
title: El amo de la casa
